ygData.messageBody:
bah;) you cheated.

Ok, lets compare /played times (grin)
49 days here=)

----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, November 14, 1999 5:39 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] posting.


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

i did play a wizard to level 18 in phase 3 beta, and quit him when that AC
patch came through, as he was getting his butt kicked way too much. i
hadn't gotten the root/nuke strategy down yet. actually was my wife who
started a bard in late phase 3 beta. was my idea, i thought it fit her,
then i also got into the bard bigtime. as far as final release, Shada was
started the first hour of the first day, probably same as Martyn. i was at
electronic's boutique before they opened, and my friends and i tipped the
clerk $20 to open the boxes early =)

Shada


> From: "Josh Moore" <josh@...>
>
> ok ok=) oops;)
> I thought you said you played a spell caster in beta?

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
